text: mariyu a grantham (taurat) lo variki memu: "Prananiki badulu pranam, kannuku badulu kannu, mukkuku badulu mukku, ceviki badulu cevi, pannuku badulu pannu mariyu gayalaku baduluga sarisamanamaina pratikaram vrasamu. Kani evaraina danini ksamiste, adi ataniki papapariharam (kaphphara)! Mariyu evaru allah avatarimpajesina sasanam prakaram tirpu ceyaro alanti varu! Vare durmargulu
